geography.q: How many time zones is the territory of China?
Bohemian Paradise is one of the natural landmarks of the Czech Republic, what is the origin of the rocks that make up the area?
What is the average temperature in the Pampas? (in celsius)

math.q: The Bulgarian athletes at the Beijing 2022 Winter Olympics are 16. Two of them must be chosen as flag bearers at the opening ceremony. How many ways can this happen?

Plamen and Ivo go down a 4 km long ski slope. At the end of the track it turned out that Plamen arrived 2 minutes after Ivo. In how many minutes did Plamen descend if the two of them started at the same time from the beginning of the track and Ivo was moving 4 km / h faster than him?

Two workers had to put window frames on a hotel. The first worker can install the joinery twice as fast as the second. The two workers started to install the joinery together, but after 4 days the second worker had to move to another site and so the first worker finished the rest of the work in the hotel for 3 days. Find out in how many days the second worker can install the joinery himself.
